title: Hello i need help
body:
when i play LOL

the mini map, shop and chatting got really small and its really hard for me to see when I'm playing

Can you plz help Thank you

replies.body:
While in game, trying going to "interface" and adjusting the "hud scale" - should hopefully fix your problem. 

You should try this in a custom game!

in the options there is a scale bar for chat, minimap and hud, its in the video or interface section I think, you probably have it scaled from 100% to 30% or something

(must be in game)
